stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Giant Beasts Leapt, Not Just Lumbered, Say Scholars!
stories.fantasy_story: Long ago, during the Age of Frost, massive beast-kangaroos roamed the lands. Many believed these enormous creatures merely lumbered, but new findings from learned scholars suggest otherwise. Their mighty limbs and sturdy bones were strong enough to support powerful leaps, defying past assumptions about their travel.

stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Elders Bear Innate Charm Against Fading Minds!
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists have uncovered a remarkable secret among the truly ancient and wise. These revered elders possess a unique boon of bloodline, making them less susceptible to the dreaded affliction of fading minds. They also carry a powerful, protective charm within their very spirit, granting them enduring sharpness throughout their long lives.

stories.fantasy_headline: Loch's Cleansing Capsule: A Swift Charm for Scullery and Trinkets!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Clan Loch has unveiled a wondrous new artifact: the Cleansing Capsule. This compact contraption swiftly purifies nobleware and even small magical trinkets with potent enchantments. It offers a splendid convenience for those dwelling in smaller abodes or traveling the open roads.
